sentences.en: The newscast covers topical events and entertainment.
sentences.cn: 该新闻广播涉及时事和娱乐。

sentences.en: He worked in the news division of ABC – he was the anchor of its 15-minute evening newscast.
sentences.cn: 他以前在美国广播公司的新闻部工作–他是该公司15分钟晚间新闻节目的主持人。

sentences.en: Radio and television anchors usually appear on more than one newscast per day.
sentences.cn: 广播电视的主播通常要在每天的新闻节目中多次出现。
